channel.title: Values on Kelly Ripple
channel.description: Recent content in Values on Kelly Ripple

item.title: Fighting the Good Fight
item.author: kelly.ripple@bti360.com (Kelly Ripple)
item.description: Last week, I reflected on Stereotype Threat and the DevBootcamp educational experience. This week, I’ll take it a step further and discuss how to fight stereotype threat and other nasties like the imposter syndrome. A little bit about me - I pursued an engineering degree from a well respected educational institution. I had a number of classes where I was the only female in the room. None of my engineering classes even approached a 50⁄50 M-to-F ratio.
